comment: joke adapted from show: would I lie to you
joke: yes. a woman calls an exorcist to her house after she notices furniture moving about.  after he finishes exorcism the furniture stops moving and the woman is pleased. when she receives the bill she realizes she can't afford to pay it. suddenly the furniture begins moving again and she asks the exorcist why it didn't work. well he said if you can't afford to pay the bill then we'll have to repossess your house.
